mapper.select: select customer_id as customerId, customer_name as customerName, gender, birthday, age, birth_place as birthPlace, address, phone_number as phoneNumber, education, profession, salary, house_number as houseNumber, car as haveCar, hobby, personality, divorce as isDivorce, company, child as childNumber, t.status from customer_info t where t.customer_id=#{customerId}

select customer_id as customerId, tdivorce as divorceReq, tdivorce_p as divorceWeg, tchild as childReq, tchild_p as childWeg, tlocal as localReq, tlocal_p as localWeg, thouse as houseReq, thouse_p as houseWeg, tcar as carReq, tcar_p as carWeg, tsalary as salaryReq, tsalary_p as salaryWeg, teducation as educationReq, teducation_p as educationWeg, tbirthmin as minAgeReq, tbirthmax as maxAgeReq, tprofession as professionReq, tprofession_p as professionWeg from customer_requirement where t.customer_id=#{customerId}

select customer_id as customerId, customer_name as customerName, gender, birthday, age, birth_place as birthPlace, address, phone_number as phoneNumber, education, profession, salary, house_number as houseNumber, car as haveCar, hobby, personality, divorce as isDivorce, company, child as childNumber, t.status from customer_info t where gender!=#{gender}, AND age>=#{minAge}, AND age<=#{maxAge}, And address in ${address}, AND education>=#{education}, AND profession in ${profession}, AND salary>=#{salary}, AND house_number>=#{houseNumber}, AND car!=#{car} , AND child<=#{child}
select dict_value from sys_dict where dict_type='address'
select dict_value from sys_dict where dict_type='profession'
